set.name: Samurai
set.longname: This is a custom art deck

card.name: Isshin, Two Heavens as One
card.text: If a creature attacking causes a triggered ability of a permanent you control to trigger, that ability triggers an additional time.

card.name: Akki Battle Squad
card.text: Whenever one or more modified creatures you control attack, untap all modified creatures you control. After this phase, there is an additional combat phase. This ability triggers only once each turn. (Equipment, Auras you control, and counters are modifications.)

card.name: Akki Ronin
card.text: Whenever a Samurai or Warrior you control attacks alone, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.

card.name: Ancestral Katana
card.text: Whenever a Samurai or Warrior you control attacks alone, you may pay {1}. When you do, attach Ancestral Katana to it. Equipped creature gets +2/+1. Equip {3} ({3}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Angelic Benediction
card.text: Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, you may tap target creature.

card.name: Angelic Exaltation
card.text: Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, it gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of creatures you control.

card.name: Arcane Signet
card.text: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.

card.name: Asari Captain
card.text: Haste Whenever a Samurai or Warrior you control attacks alone, it gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each Samurai or Warrior you control.

card.name: Banishing Slash
card.text: Destroy up to one target artifact, enchantment, or tapped creature. Then if you control an artifact and an enchantment, create a 2/2 white Samurai creature token with vigilance.

card.name: Blade of the Oni
card.text: Menace Equipped creature has base power and toughness 5/5, has menace, and is a black Demon in addition to its other colors and types. Reconfigure {2}{B}{B} ({2}{B}{B}: Attach to target creature you control; or unattach from a creature. Reconfigure only as a sorcery. While attached, this isn't a creature.)

card.name: Blood Crypt
card.text: ({T}: Add {B} or {R}.) As Blood Crypt enters, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters tapped.

card.name: Bloodfell Caves
card.text: Bloodfell Caves enters tapped. When Bloodfell Caves enters, you gain 1 life. {T}: Add {B} or {R}.

card.name: Boros Charm
card.text: Choose one — • Boros Charm deals 4 damage to target player or planeswalker. • Permanents you control gain indestructible until end of turn. • Target creature gains double strike until end of turn.

card.name: Boros Garrison
card.text: Boros Garrison enters tapped. When Boros Garrison enters, return a land you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {R}{W}.

card.name: Brave the Sands
card.text: Creatures you control have vigilance. Each creature you control can block an additional creature each combat.

card.name: Cathedral of War
card.text: Cathedral of War enters tapped. Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) {T}: Add {C}.

card.name: Clifftop Retreat
card.text: Clifftop Retreat enters tapped unless you control a Mountain or a Plains. {T}: Add {R} or {W}.

card.name: Command Tower
card.text: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.

card.name: Commander's Sphere
card.text: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity. Sacrifice Commander's Sphere: Draw a card.

card.name: Demonic Tutor
card.text: Search your library for a card, put that card into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Despark
card.text: Exile target permanent with mana value 4 or greater.

card.name: Diabolic Tutor
card.text: Search your library for a card, put that card into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Duelist's Heritage
card.text: Whenever one or more creatures attack, you may have target attacking creature gain double strike until end of turn.

card.name: Eater of Virtue
card.text: Whenever equipped creature dies, exile it. Equipped creature gets +2/+0. As long as a card exiled with Eater of Virtue has flying, equipped creature has flying. The same is true for first strike, double strike, deathtouch, haste, hexproof, indestructible, lifelink, menace, protection, reach, trample, and vigilance. Equip {1}

card.name: Eiganjo Exemplar
card.text: Whenever a Samurai or Warrior you control attacks alone, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Eiganjo Uprising
card.text: Create X 2/2 white Samurai creature tokens with vigilance. They gain menace and haste until end of turn. Each opponent creates X minus one 2/2 white Samurai creature tokens with vigilance.

card.name: Eiganjo, Seat of the Empire
card.text: {T}: Add {W}. Channel — {2}{W}, Discard Eiganjo, Seat of the Empire: It deals 4 damage to target attacking or blocking creature. This ability costs {1} less to activate for each legendary creature you control.

card.name: Fellwar Stone
card.text: {T}: Add one mana of any color that a land an opponent controls could produce.

card.name: Fervent Charge
card.text: Whenever a creature you control attacks, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Flawless Maneuver
card.text: If you control a commander, you may cast this spell without paying its mana cost. Creatures you control gain indestructible until end of turn.

card.name: General's Kabuto
card.text: Equipped creature has shroud. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.) Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to equipped creature. Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Godless Shrine
card.text: ({T}: Add {W} or {B}.) As Godless Shrine enters, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters tapped.

card.name: Goro-Goro, Disciple of Ryusei
card.text: {R}: Creatures you control gain haste until end of turn. {3}{R}{R}: Create a 5/5 red Dragon Spirit creature token with flying. Activate only if you control an attacking modified creature. (Equipment, Auras you control, and counters are modifications.)

card.name: Haunted Ridge
card.text: Haunted Ridge enters tapped unless you control two or more other lands. {T}: Add {B} or {R}.

card.name: Heiko Yamazaki, the General
card.text: Trample Whenever a Samurai or Warrior you control attacks alone, you may cast target artifact card from your graveyard this turn.

card.name: Herald's Horn
card.text: As Herald's Horn enters, choose a creature type. Creature spells you cast of the chosen type cost {1} less to cast. At the beginning of your upkeep, look at the top card of your library. If it's a creature card of the chosen type, you may reveal it and put it into your hand.

card.name: Iizuka the Ruthless
card.text: Bushido 2 (Whenever this creature blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn.) {2}{R}, Sacrifice a Samurai: Samurai creatures you control gain double strike until end of turn.

card.name: Imperial Subduer
card.text: Whenever a Samurai or Warrior you control attacks alone, tap target creature you don't control.

card.name: Ironsoul Enforcer
card.text: Whenever Ironsoul Enforcer or a commander you control attacks alone, return target artifact card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Isolated Chapel
card.text: Isolated Chapel enters tapped unless you control a Plains or a Swamp. {T}: Add {W} or {B}.

card.name: Lightning Greaves
card.text: Equipped creature has haste and shroud. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.) Equip {0}

card.name: Lizard Blades
card.text: Double strike Equipped creature has double strike. Reconfigure {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control; or unattach from a creature. Reconfigure only as a sorcery. While attached, this isn't a creature.)

card.name: Nagao, Bound by Honor
card.text: Bushido 1 (Whenever this creature blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) Whenever Nagao, Bound by Honor attacks, Samurai creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Nezumi Bladeblesser
card.text: Nezumi Bladeblesser has deathtouch as long as you control an artifact. Nezumi Bladeblesser has menace as long as you control an enchantment. (It can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

card.name: Nomad Outpost
card.text: Nomad Outpost enters tapped. {T}: Add {R}, {W}, or {B}.

card.name: Norika Yamazaki, the Poet
card.text: Vigilance Whenever a Samurai or Warrior you control attacks alone, you may cast target enchantment card from your graveyard this turn.

card.name: Oathkeeper, Takeno's Daisho
card.text: Equipped creature gets +3/+1. Whenever equipped creature dies, return that card to the battlefield under your control if it's a Samurai card. When Oathkeeper, Takeno's Daisho is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, exile equipped creature. Equip {2}

card.name: Orzhov Basilica
card.text: Orzhov Basilica enters tapped. When Orzhov Basilica enters, return a land you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {W}{B}.

card.name: Path of Ancestry
card.text: Path of Ancestry enters tapped. {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity. When that mana is spent to cast a creature spell that shares a creature type with your commander, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom.)

card.name: Path to Exile
card.text: Exile target creature. Its controller may search their library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

card.name: Peerless Samurai
card.text: Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.) Whenever a Samurai or Warrior you control attacks alone, the next spell you cast this turn costs {1} less to cast.

card.name: Raiyuu, Storm's Edge
card.text: First strike Whenever a Samurai or Warrior you control attacks alone, untap it. If it's the first combat phase of the turn, there is an additional combat phase after this phase.

card.name: Rakdos Carnarium
card.text: Rakdos Carnarium enters tapped. When Rakdos Carnarium enters, return a land you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {B}{R}.

card.name: Reinforced Ronin
card.text: Haste At the beginning of your end step, return Reinforced Ronin to its owner's hand. Channel — {1}{R}, Discard Reinforced Ronin: Draw a card.

card.name: Reliquary Tower
card.text: You have no maximum hand size. {T}: Add {C}.

card.name: Revenge of Ravens
card.text: Whenever a creature attacks you or a planeswalker you control, that creature's controller loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

card.name: Risona, Asari Commander
card.text: Haste Whenever Risona, Asari Commander deals combat damage to a player, if it doesn't have an indestructible counter on it, put an indestructible counter on it. Whenever combat damage is dealt to you, remove an indestructible counter from Risona.

card.name: Sacred Foundry
card.text: ({T}: Add {R} or {W}.) As Sacred Foundry enters, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters tapped.

card.name: Savai Triome
card.text: ({T}: Add {R}, {W}, or {B}.) Savai Triome enters tapped. Cycling {3} ({3}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

card.name: Secluded Courtyard
card.text: As Secluded Courtyard enters, choose a creature type. {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add one mana of any color. Spend this mana only to cast a creature spell of the chosen type or activate an ability of a creature source of the chosen type.

card.name: Selfless Samurai
card.text: Whenever a Samurai or Warrior you control attacks alone, it gains lifelink until end of turn. Sacrifice Selfless Samurai: Another target creature you control gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)

card.name: Sensei Golden-Tail
card.text: Bushido 1 (Whenever this creature blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) {1}{W}, {T}: Put a training counter on target creature. That creature gains bushido 1 and becomes a Samurai in addition to its other creature types. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Seven-Tail Mentor
card.text: When Seven-Tail Mentor enters or dies, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature or Vehicle you control.

card.name: Shattered Sanctum
card.text: Shattered Sanctum enters tapped unless you control two or more other lands. {T}: Add {W} or {B}.

card.name: Shinka, the Bloodsoaked Keep
card.text: {T}: Add {R}. {R}, {T}: Target legendary creature gains first strike until end of turn.

card.name: Sigil of Valor
card.text: Whenever equipped creature attacks alone, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each other creature you control. Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Sky-Blessed Samurai
card.text: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each enchantment you control. Flying

card.name: Sol Ring
card.text: {T}: Add {C}{C}.

card.name: Sunblade Samurai
card.text: Vigilance Channel — {2}, Discard Sunblade Samurai: Search your library for a basic Plains card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. You gain 2 life.

card.name: Sundown Pass
card.text: Sundown Pass enters tapped unless you control two or more other lands. {T}: Add {R} or {W}.

card.name: Sunhome, Fortress of the Legion
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {2}{R}{W}, {T}: Target creature gains double strike until end of turn.

card.name: Swiftfoot Boots
card.text: Equipped creature has hexproof and haste. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.) Equip {1}

card.name: Sword of the Animist
Swords to Plowshares
card.text: Exile target creature. Its controller gains life equal to its power.

card.name: Takenuma, Abandoned Mire
card.text: {T}: Add {B}. Channel — {3}{B}, Discard Takenuma, Abandoned Mire: Mill three cards, then return a creature or planeswalker card from your graveyard to your hand. This ability costs {1} less to activate for each legendary creature you control.

card.name: Tempered in Solitude
card.text: Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn.

card.name: Terminate
card.text: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated.

card.name: The Wandering Emperor
card.text: Flash As long as The Wandering Emperor entered this turn, you may activate her loyalty abilities any time you could cast an instant. +1: Put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature. It gains first strike until end of turn. −1: Create a 2/2 white Samurai creature token with vigilance. −2: Exile target tapped creature. You gain 2 life.

card.name: Toshiro Umezawa
card.text: Bushido 1 (Whenever this creature blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, you may cast target instant card from your graveyard. If that spell would be put into a graveyard, exile it instead.

card.name: Trepanation Blade
card.text: Whenever equipped creature attacks, defending player reveals cards from the top of their library until they reveal a land card. The creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each card revealed this way. That player puts the revealed cards into their graveyard. Equip {2}

card.name: Unclaimed Territory
card.text: As Unclaimed Territory enters, choose a creature type. {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add one mana of any color. Spend this mana only to cast a creature spell of the chosen type.

card.name: Unquenchable Fury
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has "Whenever this creature attacks, it deals X damage to defending player, where X is the number of cards in their hand." When Unquenchable Fury is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, return it to your hand.

card.name: Upriser Renegade
card.text: Upriser Renegade gets +2/+0 for each other modified creature you control. (Equipment, Auras you control, and counters are modifications.)

card.name: Vampiric Tutor
card.text: Search your library for a card, then shuffle and put that card on top. You lose 2 life.

card.name: Vandalblast
card.text: Destroy target artifact you don't control. Overload {4}{R} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change "target" in its text to "each.")

card.name: Vindicate
card.text: Destroy target permanent.

card.name: Wind-Scarred Crag
card.text: Wind-Scarred Crag enters tapped. When Wind-Scarred Crag enters, you gain 1 life. {T}: Add {R} or {W}.

card.name: You Are Already Dead
card.text: Destroy target creature that was dealt damage this turn. Draw a card.
